page.title: 16HARTWELL
page.content:
Housing in the area consists of Lower and Middle Cullamore Farms, Hrtwell Hall Farm and Hartwell Stud Farm, odd cottages and modern houses dotted about. A public footpath runs trhough woodland and farm land and to the left of Hartwell Hall. Hartwell Hall is not open to the public, strictly private with a lodge at the entrance to extensive grounds and gardens.
{Stoke_on_Trent Rugby Union Football {Club} _ A third pitch is under construction at the present time. The pitch has been dug out and the goals have been erected. It is now awaiting turf.
